name: Facebook - Disable messaging
description: For people who are already on Facebook's XMPP server.
additional_info: This style was made to hide the message windows that plague many a Facebook user and to hide the Messages button, because the in-page messaging functionality in Facebook would become broken after applying this style. This is not Javascript to make messaging useless, it just hides things you'd rather not be seeing concurrently with Pidgin, Trillian, Jabber, Facebook Messenger or some other messenger with XMPP / Jabber support. If you want to make the message windows transparent instead, I made this real easy for the novice to do; Change line 6 from display: none to opacity: 0.75, remove line 5 (making line 6 become line 5) and play with it from there.
